Package arcade.env.comp

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Component
    A Component object is a steppable that interacts with the environment.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CycleComponent
    Implementation of Component for cycling sources.
    DegradeComponent
    Implementation of Component for degrading edges.
    Diffuser
    Implementation of Component for diffusion.
    Generator
    Implementation of Component for generating concentrations.
    GraphSites
    Extension of Sites for graph sites.
    GraphSites.Root
    Container class for details of root nodes.
    GraphSites.SiteEdge
    Extension of Graph.Edge for site edges.
    GraphSites.SiteNode
    Extension of Graph.Node for site nodes.
    GraphSitesUtilities
    Container class for utility functions used by GraphSites.
    PatternSites
    Extension of Sites for pattern sites.
    PulseComponent
    Implementation of Component for pulsing sources.
    RectDiffuser
    Extension of Diffuser for rectangular lattice.
    RectGraphSites
    Extension of GraphSites for rectangular lattice.
    RectGraphSites.Complex
    Extension of RectGraphSites using complex hemodynamics.
    RectGraphSites.Simple
    Extension of RectGraphSites using simple hemodynamics.
    RectPatternSites
    Extension of PatternSites for rectangular lattice.
    RemodelComponent
    Implementation of Component for remodeling edges.
    Site
    Specification of molecular details for Sites.
    Sites
    Implementation of Component for generator sites.
    SourceSites
    Extension of Sites for source sites.
    TriDiffuser
    Extension of Diffuser for triangular lattice.
    TriGraphSites
    Extension of GraphSites for triangular lattice.
    TriGraphSites.Complex
    Extension of TriGraphSites using simple hemodynamics.
    TriGraphSites.Simple
    Extension of TriGraphSites using simple hemodynamics.
    TriPatternSites
    Extension of PatternSites for triangular lattice.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GraphSites.Border
    Environment border locations.
